Neelam Polki Chandbali: A Regal Symphony of Tradition and Modernity

₹56,752

Description

This Chandbali showcases authentic Hyderabadi Polki craftsmanship, combining traditional design with modern sophistication. The use of premium Tanzanite and South Sea pearls elevates its value and appeal. This piece is not just jewelry; it's a heirloom, a symbol of enduring elegance and cultural heritage. Its intricate detailing and vibrant gemstones make it a true conversation starter.

Materials

  • 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
  • Premium Quality Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds)
  • Faceted Tanzanite Drops
  • Emeralds
  • South Sea Pearls.

Features

This exquisite Chandbali design features a central Tanzanite drop embraced by a floral halo of Polki diamonds. The circular frame is adorned with alternating emeralds and polkis. The base showcases lustrous South Sea pearls, each delicately connected with emerald beads for added elegance. The polki settings reflect traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, offering a timeless appeal. The central part is an intricate bell design, which carries another tanzanite drop to balance the chandelier's visual weight.
